original_title: Bassie & Adriaan: De reis vol verrassingen
overview: The three crooks lure Bassie and Adriaan to Curacao to take care of them once and for all. This doesn't go as planned. Back in The Netherlands Bassie wins a trip to the USA in a TV quiz and takes Adriaan on a tour of the whole country. What they don't know is that de Baron, B100 and Handige Harry are on their trail.
title: Bassie & Adriaan: De reis vol verrassingen
